tools.offset-calculator.title: Offset Calculator
tools.offset-calculator.description: Memory address offset calculation and conversion
tools.offset-calculator.aboutDesc: The offset calculator is used for address calculations in reverse engineering. VA (Virtual Address) is the actual address in process memory; RVA (Relative Virtual Address) is the offset relative to the image base; File Offset is the position of data in PE/ELF files. Formulas: RVA = VA - ImageBase; Raw = RVA - SectionRVA + SectionRawOffset
